summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganSustainable PackagingGive BackDermalogica's Special Cleansing Gel is an iconic soap-free, foaming gel cleanser. Formulated with lavender, it removes impurities and excess oils, leaving the skin feeling smooth and clean, without disturbing the skin's natural moisture balance.
details: DetailsBenefitsGentle, foaming face wash gelRefreshing lather, thoroughly rinses away daily toxins and debris to leave skin feeling soft and smoothLightweight and mild enough to use every day - does not strip or dry out the skinGreat for all skin typesKey IngredientsLavender: soothes and reduces redness and acne scarringQuillaja Saponaria Bark Extract: naturally foams and cleansesBalm Mint: soothes and cleanses the skinItem 2158366How To UseGently lather a small amount of gel in moistened hands and apply to dampened face and neck. Rinse with warm water. Follow with toner and moisturizer.Tip: Use with an exfoliating face brush.IngredientsWater/Aqua/Eau, Sodium C14-16 Olefin Sulfonate, Sodium Lauroyl Sarcosinate, Butylene Glycol, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil, Quillaja Saponaria Bark Extract, Citrus Limon (Lemon) Peel Oil, Melissa Officinalis Leaf Extract, Citrus Aurantium Bergamia (Bergamot) Fruit Oil, Cymbopogon Nardus (Citronella) Oil, Glycerin, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Cocoamphoacetate, Hydroxyacetophenone, Cocamidopropyl Hydroxysultaine, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Propanediol, Citric Acid, O-Cymen5-Ol, Disodium EDTA, PPG-5-Ceteth-20, Sodium Hydroxide, Sodium Benzoate.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Gently lather a small amount of gel in moistened hands and apply to dampened face and neck. Rinse with warm water. Follow with toner and moisturizer.Tip: Use with an exfoliating face brush.

reviews.headline: Dry skin
reviews.comments: From my personal experience this product cause a very dry skin no recommend for mature aging skin

reviews.headline: Great product
reviews.comments: This face cleaner is gentle, and makes my face feel clean.   I get the big bottle and it lasts a really long time. You only need a small amount to lather up.

reviews.headline: This broke me out.
reviews.comments: I used to have a lot of acne. I used to buy a lot of stuff to treat acne and it never went away. I got pregnant and you know when you're pregnant you can't really use everything so I limited my skin care to really simple stuff such as just normal face cleanser, moisturizer, and sunscreen and that's it after getting pregnant and after one full year postpartum my skin is thriving no acne at all nothing and I said maybe everything that I was buying to treat acne was actually keeping it and not treating it so using simple skin care really healed my skin I ran out of my normal face cleanser. I said OK let me try this out. Suddenly my face is all acne so I am sure that this is what broke me out because I haven't changed anything in my skin care other than this. Definitely would not buy again.

reviews.headline: do NOT buy this hot garbage
reviews.comments: this destroyed my face. cystic white heads allllll over my.cheeks and jawline very displeased. will be returning this garbage

reviews.headline: Staple in my daily routine
reviews.comments: I have sensitive skin and this product works great. It cleanses my skin without stripping it/drying it out.

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again
reviews.comments: Loved it! Will purchase again

reviews.headline: Amazing
reviews.comments: I have used this for years and although it is pricey it is the perfect cleanser for makeup brushes. I do a double cleanse on my skin at night before bed with this and then follow up with the skin smoothing moisturizer. I just started using it for makeup brushes and realized just how good it really is. Its gets brushed clean in one wash.

reviews.headline: Amazing
reviews.comments: I have used this for years and although it is pricey it is the perfect cleanser for makeup brushes. I do a double cleanse on my skin at night before bed with this and then follow up with the skin smoothing moisturizer. I just started using it for makeup brushes and realized just how good it really is. Its gets brushed clean in one wash.

reviews.headline: Fantastic
reviews.comments: This cleanser is wonderful. My face felt so clean without feeling stripped. It also made my face really soft after one wash. I have very acne reactive skin and my face loved this product. I have moved on to another, cheaper cleanser and I am thinking about going back to this one instead.

reviews.headline: I have used Special Cleansing Gel for over 25 years.
reviews.comments: Best cleanser. Have used it for years and always get compliments about my skin

reviews.headline: Best for sensitive skin and even for after shave!
reviews.comments:
No doubt that Dermalogica has one of most best results skin products in the market. 
The Special cleanser gel it's extraordinary,
Me and my husband love it! And it last forever, We used twice a day. The company it is environment conscious that has a refill

reviews.headline: Pricy but lasts
reviews.comments: I am 35, Asian, and have combination skin. I strictly use Dermalogica skincare for all my needs (pre-cleanse, toner, cleaner, exfoliant, vitamin-c, retinol, and moisturizer). I have seen vast improvements in my skin after switching from drugstore back to Dermalogica. I tried drugstore for a while but find this brand worth the investment. Everything goes a long way. The last time I bought cleanser was 5/30/24. I am ALMOST out of cleanser as of 3/18/25. I still have quite a bit left and am convinced I can at least make it to mid-April before refilling. I use the TINIEST drop when cleansing and it gets my face, neck, and chest. Cant recommend this brand enough. Your skin is worth the investment!!

reviews.headline: yikes
reviews.comments: left chemical burns on my skin and did not help with acne

reviews.headline: yikes
reviews.comments: left chemical burns on my skin and did not help with acne

reviews.headline: Nice and fresh.
reviews.comments: I absolutely love Dermalogica Special Cleansing Gel! It has done wonders for my skin. After using it, my skin feels incredibly smooth and refreshed, and the scent is just perfectâ€”light and fresh without being overpowering. What I really appreciate is how thoroughly it cleanses without causing any irritation. My skin feels clean, balanced, and never tight or dry. It's become an essential part of my daily skincare routine, and I highly recommend it!

reviews.headline: I accidentally found this product when I received a sample .
reviews.comments: I purchased this sample size to use when traveling. Great product. Does not irritate my sensitive skin.

reviews.headline: Replenish!
reviews.comments: This is my go to cleanser.  Not drying!

reviews.headline: Perfect refill
reviews.comments: Needed to refill my pump.  Worked

reviews.headline: love it!
reviews.comments: I love this facewash! I got a sample of it in my Ulta 25 days of self care advent calendar. A drop goes a long way- it covers my face, neck and chest. I like the consistency and my face feels really clean, but not tight like some deep clean face washes. I usually use Cerve salicylic acid face wash but maybe ill treat myself to this one!

reviews.headline: eh
reviews.comments: I had high hopes for this cleanser.  It is just ok. I would say it is nice on the body, not the face. I don't wear makeup and my skin didn't feel clean after washing with this cleanser. I'll stick to my other, much less expensive, face wash.

media.headline: I was on Periscope and someone recommended this product

faceoff_positive.comments:
Let me tell you about my love life. Over the past decade or so, I haven't found been able to find love anywhere within the cleansing department. The cleansers on the shelves at my nearest department store routinely broke my heart. Didn't live up to my expectations. Contained fragrances, colors, beads and more. None of them were my type. What can I say? I'm picky like that.

But don't get me wrong: there were times when I thought that things could work out. Cleanser after cleanser made promise after promise. One time, I thought for sure that I found a cleanser that could give me everything I needed, but it turns out that by the end of the day, my skin felt oily and my pores felt ashamed.

It wasn't until my lovely mother took it upon herself to find me the best of the best. Top of the line. You can call it an arranged marriage, if you want (I won't be offended). I'm proud to report that I did fall in love--I fell in love with Dermalogica's Special Cleansing Gel and no longer do I peruse department store shelves. This is it, friends. This is it.

This gel is so polite. Easy on my skin, you know? It also does not have bad odor. In fact, it's fragrance-free. We get along well; people have been complimenting me a lot lately! I express my happiness by simply saying that Special Cleansing Gel treats me well. That's my motto: "S.C. Gel treats me well!" I've even yelled it out of my bathroom window once.

Here's what I have to say to all of you frustrated, perfect-cleansing-product seekers: the good news is, you could fall in love with S.C. Gel, too. Whether your mother arranges it or you make the first move, this gel will be waiting for you.
faceoff_positive.headline: No More Ashamed Pores

faceoff_negative.comments: I have been using this cleanser for over 13 years. It's the one skincare product I have never had to consider changing - no matter what was going on with my complexion, Special Cleansing Gel worked. Until now. The change in my latest shipment was immediately noticeable - fragrance! Not a good sign for sensitive skin. Within three uses, my skin was red and irritated. After comparing the ingredient list to my kids' (older) container, there were indeed changes. I'm so disappointed! Dermalogica has lost a customer and I (and my entire family) must find a new cleanser.
faceoff_negative.headline: Sad about the change.
